definition: (Chinese) National People's Congress (abbr. for 全國人民代表大會|全国人民代表大会[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4])/Renmin University of China (abbr. for 中國人民大學|中国人民大学[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Da4 xue2])
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
abbr. for 全國人大會議|全国人大会议[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4], National People's Congress (NPC)
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4
Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee attended the abovementioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大常委会副委员长热地参加了上述活动。

sentences.english: May I ask you to postpone the meeting until the day after tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 人大。可能要求你将会面技术延到后天吗？

sentences.english: They returned the kindness to Chairman Li and the National People's Congress of China.
sentences.chinese: 他们也向李委员长和中国全国人大转达了问候。

sentences.english: NPC deputies will review the draft general provisions of civil law of China.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大代表将审议《民法通则草案》总则。

sentences.english: The present representatives' quality is yet to be improved.
sentences.chinese: 目前的人大代表素质尚有待于提高。

sentences.english: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th NPC will deliver a speech.
sentences.chinese: 第十一届全国人大常委会委员长讲话。

sentences.english: National People's Congress is now less true nature and a child-like innocence.
sentences.chinese: 现在的人大都少了真实的本性，和一份孩子样的纯真。

sentences.english: Shanghai NPC vice-director Ren Weiyang with Zheng Yuanbao board chairman.
sentences.chinese: 上海市人大副主任任文燕与郑元豹董事长。

sentences.english: Yueqin island supernatural beauty daidouji naokou is incredibly "queen"?
sentences.chinese: 月琴岛上的绝世美人大路寺智子竟然是“蜂王”？

sentences.english: A week earlier he was also in North Korea with a parliamentary delegation.
sentences.chinese: 此前一周，他还随中国人大代表团到访朝鲜。

sentences.english: The meeting was hosted by Director Pei of Fancheng District People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 演讲知识培训由樊城区人大裴主任主持。

sentences.english: The survey was conducted after the Central Government announced its intention to interpret the Basic Law again.
sentences.chinese: 调查在中央政府宣布人大再次释法后进行。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the NPC Re Di was present at the talks.
sentences.chinese: 中国全国人大常委会副委员长热地等参加了会谈。

sentences.chinese: 没想到这里似乎比人大附中还要紧张。

sentences.english: People who do not work in a spinnery mostly have no idea about doffing.
sentences.chinese: 不在纺织工厂工作的人大多不理解什么是落纱。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee accompanied Wu during the visit and meeting.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大常委会副委员长热地陪同参观和接见。

definition: to attend a meeting as a nonvoting delegate
all walks of life/all social circles
